briefdescription.para: Create an event listener object.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the event handler function.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe a listener to an event type as first module that is being notified.
Subscribe a listener to the early notification list for an event type.
Subscribe a listener to the normal notification list for an event type.
Subscribe a listener to an event type as final module that is being notified.
Declare an event type.

detaileddescription.para: This macro provides declarations required for an event to be used by other modules.

briefdescription.para: Declare an event type with dynamic data size.

detaileddescription.para: This macro provides declarations required for an event to be used by other modules. Declared event will use dynamic data.

briefdescription.para: Define an event type.

detaileddescription.para: This macro defines an event type. In addition, it defines functions specific to the event type and the event type structure.

For every defined event, the following functions are created, where event_type is replaced with the given event type name ename (for example, button_event):
new_event_type - Allocates an event of a given type.
is_event_type - Checks if the application event header that is provided as argument represents the given event type.
cast_event_type - Casts the application event header that is provided as argument to an event of the given type.

parameterdescription.para: Function to stringify an event of this type.
Data structure describing the event type.
Event type flags. You should use APP_EVENT_FLAGS_CREATE to define them.

briefdescription.para: Verify if an event ID is valid.

detaileddescription.para: The pointer to an event type structure is used as its ID. This macro validates that the provided pointer is within the range where event type structures are defined.

briefdescription.para: Submit an event.

detaileddescription.para: This helper macro simplifies the event submission.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook after the Application Event Manager is initialized.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called after the app_event_manager is initialized to provide some additional initialization of the modules that depends on it. The hook function should have a form int hook(void). If the initialization hook returns non-zero value the initialization process is interrupted.

briefdescription.para: Register hook called on event submission. The hook would be called first.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called when the event is submitted. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called first. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

simplesect.para: The registered hook may be called from many contexts. To ensure that order of events in the queue matches the order of the registered callbacks calls, the callbacks are called under the same spinlock as adding events to the queue.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on submission.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called when the event is submitted. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh).

simplesect.para: The registered hook may be called from many contexts. To ensure that order of events in the queue matches the order of the registered callbacks calls, the callbacks are called under the same spinlock as adding events to the queue.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on submission. The hook would be called last.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called when the event is submitted. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called last. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

simplesect.para: The registered hook may be called from many contexts. To ensure that order of events in the queue matches the order of the registered callbacks calls, the callbacks are called under the same spinlock as adding events to the queue.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the start of event processing. The hook would be called first.

detaileddescription.para: The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called first. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the start of event processing.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called when the event is being processed. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh).

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the start of event processing. The hook would be called last.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called when the event is being processed. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called last. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the end of event processing. The hook would be called first.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called after the event is processed. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called first. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the end of event processing.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called after the event is processed. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh).

briefdescription.para: Register event hook on the end of event processing. The hook would be called last.

detaileddescription.para: The event hook called after the event is processed. The hook function should have a form void hook(const struct app_event_header *aeh). The macro makes sure that the hook provided here is called last. Only one hook can be registered with this macro.

memberdef.name: APP_EVENT_MANAGER_LOG

briefdescription.para: Log event.

detaileddescription.para: This helper macro simplifies event logging.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the application event header of the event that is processed by app_event_manager.
printf- like format string and variadic list of arguments corresponding to the format string.

briefdescription.para: Define flags for event type.

parameterdescription.para: Comma-separated list of flags which should be set. In case no flags should be set leave it empty.

detaileddescription.para: marks beginning of flags controlled internally by Application Event Manager.
indicates that event type has variable data size. Flag set internally by Application Event Manager.
marks beginning of flags set by user.
enables event logging from the application start. Flag set by user.
shows number of predefined flags.
marks beginning of user-specific flags.

briefdescription.para: List of bits in event type flags.
Pointer to the event handler function.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the application event header of the event that is processed by app_event_manager.
if event was consumed and should not be propagated to other listeners, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get event type flag's value.
Get the event size.

detaileddescription.para:
Function that calculates the event size using its header.
For this function to be available the embed:rst:inline :kconfig:option:`CONFIG_APP_EVENT_MANAGER_PROVIDE_EVENT_SIZE` option needs to be enabled.
aeh
Pointer to the application event header.
Event size in bytes.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the Application Event Manager.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Error values can be added by the hooks registered by APP_EVENT_MANAGER_HOOK_POSTINIT_REGISTER macro.

briefdescription.para: Allocate event.

detaileddescription.para: The behavior of this function depends on the actual implementation. The default implementation of this function is same as k_malloc. It is annotated as weak and can be overridden by user.

parameterdescription.para: of the allocated memory if successful, otherwise NULL.

briefdescription.para: Free memory occupied by the event.

detaileddescription.para: The behavior of this function depends on the actual implementation. The default implementation of this function is same as k_free. It is annotated as weak and can be overridden by user.

briefdescription.para: Application Event Manager header.
